pr_title: Fix enum reflection test for jdk15+

timeline.message:
Fix enum reflection test for jdk15+

Enum classes have a third synthetic method in jdk15+, `$values()`.
Also fixed some mistakes in the enum test.

Fixes #9216

[ci skip]

Signed-off-by: Peter Shipton <Peter_Shipton@ca.ibm.com>

Fix enum reflection test for jdk15+

Enum classes have a third synthetic method in jdk15+, `$values()`.
Also fixed some mistakes in the enum test.

Fixes #9216

[ci skip]

Signed-off-by: Peter Shipton <Peter_Shipton@ca.ibm.com>

timeline.author: DanHeidinga

replies.bodyText: @DanHeidinga When the code is compiled without -parameters, getModifiers() on the parameters returns 0. See the other tests without -parameters. The only reason it worked with ACC_MANDATED before is because the "without parameters" test was using the wrong "with parameters" class.
replies.author: pshipton
